member.name: M:Rainbow.DesktopModules.FAQs.myDataList_ItemCommand(System.Object,System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs)
member.summary: The myDataList_ItemCommand function is used to determine the FAQ the user selected in the form

member.name: M:Rainbow.DesktopModules.FAQs.BindData
member.summary: The Binddata method on this User Control is used to obtain a DataReader of event information from the FAQ table, and then databind the results to a templated DataList server control. It uses the Rainbow.FAGsDB() data component to encapsulate all data functionality.

member.name: M:Rainbow.DesktopModules.FAQs.SearchSqlSelect(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.String)
member.param: Id of the user is searching
The fields where perfoming the search
member.returns: The SELECT sql to perform a search on the current module
